item.title: Project 1: Breast Cancer Prediction Using Machine Learning
item.description: Study the dataset of breast cancer. Analysis the prediction of the test data. Predict target variable data. Compare the performance of the models by using Logistic Regression, Decision Tree Classifier, Random Forest Calssifier, Support Vector Classifier. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 2: Streamlit web app for stock price analysis.
item.description: Stock price analysis web app using Streamlit library. Stock price analysis of Tesla, Inc. Link to Github repository
